General.Name: Asante Gold Corporation
General.Description: Asante Gold Corporation, a mineral exploration company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, development, and operation of mineral resource properties in the Republic of Ghana. It holds 100% interest in the Fahiakoba concession situated in the Ashanti and Central regions in the Republic of Ghana; and 90% interest in the Bibiani gold mine located in the western region of Ghana. The company also has an option to acquire a 100% interest in the Betenase permit located in Ghana; 90% interest in the Kubi Mining lease located in Ghana; and 100% interest in the Keyhole Gold project. Asante Gold Corporation was incorporated in 2011 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 800 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2V6
